title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Strategies to Enhance Learning Engagement Through Online Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more instructional design approaches that integrate assessment activities and interactive elements in online environments
Learners can analyze learning engagement metrics (concentration level, interest level) with 80% accuracy in simulation/VR-based instructional materials
Learners can propose educational design strategies to reduce dropout rates by 15% or more using experimental data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
